scripts.test: npm run prettier && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat test
scripts.coverage: npx hardhat coverage && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.deploy: export DEPLOY_MAINNET=1 && npx hardhat deploy --network mainnet && npm run verify -- --network mainnet
scripts.deploy:sepolia: export DEPLOY_MAINNET=0 && npx hardhat deploy --network sepolia && npm run verify -- --network sepolia
